title: New: AIYA – Go
body:
Love the way that this new track from Australian duo **AIYA** manipulates the silences, reminds me of the early James Blake demos.

Obvious FKA Twigs comparisons were dropped on them for their first track, If I Could Get, yet _Go_ is more Holy Herndon than Tahliah Barnett in truth. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
